posts.post_title: Mayo Cut Plugs for sale all SGC graded 1 left!!! HOFer
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott brockelman
I have 4 N300 Mayo Cut Plug cards for sale.

John Clarkson SGC 20 looks much stronger, grade due to a couple of flecks at top and some minor paste residue on the back, crease free. $1,100

James Ryan SGC 10 tack hole at top, crease free. $SOLD

Tommy Tucker SGC 10 paper loss on the front $ SOLD

Bill Joyce SGC 10 due to paper loss on the back, the front looks like a 70,  $SOLD

all prices delivered.
